name: Tank of War-VR
description:
Relations
The game player need to play a refined soldier from the United Nations elite armored forces, lead the military to support the front, against the terrorist organization that causes confusion throughout the world-"Tadr". The game player not only can experience the plentiful rich story, but also feel the different map style. In addition, you can invite your friends on-line matching to fight and feel the dynamic real shooting pleasure.
The game player can use computer to play game, haven’t VR devices player can use keybord operation. Also supports VR devices, OculusRift and HTCvive. The game has a high degree of freedom, Exquisite picture. In this game you not only can have a rich story mode, training mode, battle mode, but also invite your friends to join the experience and feelings with this super-realistic extreme challenge.
Features
Sophisticated sensory stimulation Perfect anti-vertigo
In order to create a real interactive effect, we refer to the realistic map appearance and tank prototype and so on for making the highest quality images in the scene map and tank modeling. With sophisticated VR equipment, we make further enhancement in the visual sensory stimulation which add to the immersion for the game player. WuXi Brahma Game has many years of research and development technology reserves, we also have a consistent understanding and research on VR hardware, technology community and experience learning with many domestic and foreign enterprises, constantly optimize the game operation and user experience, finally we solved the dizzy problem of wearing VR.



Powerful Battle System Excitement & Joy
As the game's main PVP Battle mode, it creates a real-life exciting battle scenes for the player, not only because the breathtaking terrain, harsh weather and other map environments, but also the difficulty of the game increased. After entering the battle, players be able to personally experience the rich wonderful game from Stronghold contention, Intense Tame Fight and different Versus.



Rich and Dramatic plot Strong sense of immersion
Story Mode is not only provide you with a variety of different styles of maps, and each battle you can feel a complex and crisis awareness at every level. By advancing the difficulty of each level, you can trigger a variety of plot arrangements. This Game finally shows player a passionate and adventure fighting, you will find yourself in an entirely new world, enjoy yourself so much without any thought of leaving.



A variety of Tanks Military Fans Favorite
Military Fans Favorite! As the most important output main force in the game battle, we prepared for you classic tanks from several countries, provided you a wide range of options. And main battle tanks served many wars are also included! Waiting for you to collect the main battle tanks such as ZTZ-99, M1A2, 2A6, Merkava MBT, T-90, K2, Leclerc AMX-56, STC Type 90 and so on!



Diversified Grower Different Develop
The game player can make Attribute Growth for their own tanks, Each Tank has a different numeric value. Technology Growth can help the game player to enhance the corresponding attributes, so that the player in the battle make a clean sweep of all obstacles wherever the player goes. Light up the Fire, Right on the power!
